name: html5
description: ##Spec : Three.js, HTML5 Audio, Canvas ##functions : 1. Detecting if browsers can run HTML5. (Three.js) 2. Can control projection by moving field of view, moving position of it 3. (Mode 1) Can control with Keyboard, Mouse  3-1. Keyboard   Move Forward = Up & W / Move Backward = Down & S / Move Left = Left & A / Move Right = Right & D  3-2. Mouse   Tracking mouse moving, Sight angle is determined by mouse moving. 4. (Mode 2) No control by Users but it will play itself.  4-1. viewing tranformation   - Viewing point will be moved itself as intended.   - would be added some music. and make go with projection. 5. texture     5-1 Canvas
